Camera sees thief. Our proprietary FridgeCam™ unit activates on door-open events and captures 4K footage of every hand that enters the refrigerator. Yes, every hand.

02

AI identifies thief. Facial recognition cross-references against your company directory. Match confidence: 99.7%. The remaining 0.3% is Brad from IT who wears sunglasses indoors.

Email shames thief. An algorithmically crafted passive-aggressive email is dispatched within 90 seconds. Subject line calibrated to maximum guilt at minimum HR liability.
